attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the goverment must stop sending weapons to israel as they are massicaring women and children(innocent civillians) the zionists must be stopped as this has become a palestinian holocaust of today.
unnfortunately the world watches by as this holocaust is taking place. the least we can do is sign this petition.
and pray and hope the goverment stops funding a continued massacare. 
Zakerah-13 years old

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
